title: Flex 5v5 to Challenger, Looking for People!
body:
Hey Guys! 
I'm currently looking for some people to reclaim my spot in challenger this season. Unfortunately it's very boring to play with randoms all the time.
Now i'm looking for people to join me.

About me :
I'm a gp/top main so i'd most likely play top in that flex queue, mid is viable tho.

About you :
Would be good if you're atleast d3+ , that's all you need.

IGN : Schnotty Top

GL & HF on the rift people!
